name: Mianach
description:
Gold, precious gems, valuable minerals... a bounty, to be sure, for the one who comes to claim it.

But no one has ever returned from the Mianach - their greed pulling them deeper, and deeper...

---

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys -> Move
  • Z -> Attack
